SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JETBRAINS_TEAMCITY.PUB.INCLUDE.EXECUTION_ENVIRONMENT : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Teamcity URL" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_TMC_URL#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_TMC_USERNAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Build Id" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_TMC_BUILD_ID#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
!----------------------------------- validation of username and password ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Initialize the AE variable for username/password check : SET &CRED# = 0
! username : IF &UC4RB_TMC_USERNAME# <> "" : SET &CRED# = &CRED# +1 : ENDIF
! password : IF &UC4RB_TMC_PASSWORD# <> "" : SET &CRED# = &CRED# +1 : ENDIF
: IF &CRED# EQ 1 : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "EITHER PROVIDE BOTH OR NONE OF THE OPTIONS(USERNAME,PASSWORD)" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR : SET &UC4RB_TMC_RETCODE# = 1 : ELSE ! ----------------------------- Creating cURL command to call Teamcity REST api ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
! Teamcity url : SET &TMC_CURL_CMD# = "curl "
! check if the login is anonymous or not : IF &CRED# EQ 0 : SET &AUTH# = "guestAuth" : ELSE : SET &AUTH# = "httpAuth"
! Username : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JETBRAINS_TEAMCITY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &UC4RB_TMC_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_TMC_USERNAME# : SET &USERNAME# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#
! Password is decrypted : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_TMC_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD : ENDIF
! Teamcity URL : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JETBRAINS_TEAMCITY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &UC4RB_TMC_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_TMC_URL# : SET &TMC_URL# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#
! Build Id : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JETBRAINS_TEAMCITY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &UC4RB_TMC_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_TMC_BUILD_ID#
! Forming teamcity URL : SET &TMC_BUILD_STATUS_URL# = STR_CAT(&TMC_URL#, "/&AUTH#/app/rest/builds/id:&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : SET &TMC_CURL_CMD# = STR_CAT(&TMC_CURL_CMD#, """&TMC_BUILD_STATUS_URL#""")
: SET &TMC_CURL_CMD# = STR_CAT(&TMC_CURL_CMD#, " --request GET --silent")
! -------------------------------------Execute cURL cmd based on AGENT OS-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : SET &UC4RB_TMC_ERROR_MSG# = "UNABLE TO CONNECT TO TEAMCITY. PLEASE CHECK INPUT PARAMETERS."
: IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" ! Logging the cURL command formed echo "CURL CMD: &TMC_CURL_CMD#" echo | set /p="UC4RB_TMC_RESP::=" : IF &CRED# EQ 0 &TMC_CURL_CMD# -w "\nUC4RB_TMC_RESP_HTTP_CODE::=%%{http_code}\n" : ELSE &TMC_CURL_CMD# -u "&USERNAME#:%UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD%" -w "\nUC4RB_TMC_RESP_HTTP_CODE::=%%{http_code}\n" : ENDIF
IF NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 ( echo "ERROR: &UC4RB_TMC_ERROR_MSG#" SET ERRORS=1 ) : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JETBRAINS_TEAMCITY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &UC4RB_TMC_ESCAPED_STRING# = &TMC_CURL_CMD# echo "CURL CMD: &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#" echo -n "UC4RB_TMC_RESP::=" : IF &CRED# EQ 0 &TMC_CURL_CMD# -w "\nUC4RB_TMC_RESP_HTTP_CODE::=%{http_code}\n" : ELSE &TMC_CURL_CMD# -u "&USERNAME#:$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD" -w "\nUC4RB_TMC_RESP_HTTP_CODE::=%{http_code}\n" : ENDIF
if [ "$?" -gt "0" ] then echo "ERROR: &UC4RB_TMC_ERROR_MSG#" errors=1 fi : ENDIF : ENDIF !-----------------------------------Error Handling------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** GET BUILD INFO CMD EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** GET BUILD STATE STATUS ACTION FAILED ********"
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JETBRAINS_TEAMCITY.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
:SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE")
:IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : SET &UC4RB_TMC_RESP# = "" : SET &UC4RB_TMC_RESP_HTTP_CODE# = "" : PSET &UC4RB_TMC_BUILD_STATE# = "" : PSET &UC4RB_TMC_BUILD_STATUS# = "" : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP",,"COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : IF &KEY# = "UC4RB_TMC_RESP" ! get the response xml in a variable : SET &UC4RB_TMC_RESP# = &VALUE# : ELSE : IF &KEY# = "UC4RB_TMC_RESP_HTTP_CODE" ! get the response code : SET &UC4RB_TMC_RESP_HTTP_CODE# = &VALUE# : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
! Check the response code for 200 : IF &UC4RB_TMC_RESP_HTTP_CODE# NE "200" : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="ERROR COMMUNICATING TO TEAMCITY" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=1 : ELSE : IF &UC4RB_TMC_RESP# <> "" : SET &ROOTHND# = XML_OPEN(STRING, &UC4RB_TMC_RESP#) : IF &ROOTHND# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_TMC_BUILD_STATUS# = XML_GET_ATTRIBUTE(&ROOTHND#, "@status") : SET &UC4RB_TMC_BUILD_STATE# = XML_GET_ATTRIBUTE(&ROOTHND#, "@state") : PUBLISH &UC4RB_TMC_BUILD_STATUS#,,"TOP" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_TMC_BUILD_STATE#,,"TOP" : ENDIF : XML_CLOSE : ELSE : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="NO RESPONSE FOUND" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=1 : ENDIF : ENDIF
:ENDIF
